front.title: Definitions of Managed Objects for SNA Data Link Control: LLC

abstract.t: This specification defines an extension to the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with SNMP-based network management. In particular, it defines objects for managing the configuration, monitoring and control of data link controls in an SNA environment. This draft identifies managed objects for SNA Logical Link Control (LLC) links only. This memo does not specify a standard for the Internet community.
